mapper.select: select *from t_order where member_id=#{memberId} and orderDate=#{orderDate} and setmeal_id=#{setmealId}

select m.name as member, s.name as setmeal, DATE_FORMAT(o.orderDate,'%Y-%m-%d') orderDate, o.orderType from t_member as m, t_setmeal as s, t_order as o where o.id=#{orderId} and o.member_id=m.id and o.setmeal_id=s.id
